titles.title: A bill to extend the temporary suspension of duty on certain AC electric motors of an output exceeding 37.5 W but not exceeding 72 W.
A bill to extend the temporary suspension of duty on certain AC electric motors of an output exceeding 37.5 W but not exceeding 72 W.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend the temporary suspension of duty on certain AC electric motors of an output exceeding 74.6 W but not exceeding 72 W.
